name: Three Sheets To The Wind
description:
What is Three Sheets To The Wind?

threesheets is an arcade-style time-attack game, where you take the helm of an ocean-racing sailboat in beautiful and challenging waters. Race through the checkpoints and reach the goal before time runs out!

What do I get?

A finished game of arcade (~20min) length, with simple controls and the usual shiny graphics of an Unreal Engine 4 game. There's also a retro-style password save system!

Do I need a gaming PC?

threesheets was tested on a system with a 6th gen Core i5, 12GB RAM and a 2GB GTX1050. At this spec, the game runs as intended. You'll need Windows 64bit and a monitor that supports 1080p.

Please enjoy!
